001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.viewmodel;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
005import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
006import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity.Location;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.pojo.GPSCoord;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.service.LocationRepository;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
011import java.util.List;
012import javax.inject.Inject;
013
014/**
015 * This viewmodel provides an interface between the UI and the Location Repository.
016 * This is used to send a request to store amd mark a location as secure as well as
017 * provide the UI with locations to display
018 *
019 */
020@HiltViewModel
021public class LocationViewModel extends ViewModel {
022
023  private final LocationRepository repository;
024  private final LiveData<List<Location>> location;
025  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
026  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
027
028  /**
029   * This viewmodel is intialized with the locaiton repository and defines
030   * the location, a throwable and a disposable
031   * @param repository
032   */
033  @Inject
034  public LocationViewModel(LocationRepository repository) {
035    this.repository = repository;
036    location = new MutableLiveData<>();
037    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
038    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * This retrieves all locations stored in the Location entity
043   * @return
044   */
045  public LiveData<List<Location>> getLocation() {
046    return repository.getAll();
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * This sets a location with a marker indicating if the location is secure
051   * @param secure
052   */
053  public void markLocation(boolean secure) {
054    throwable.setValue(null);
055    repository.add(secure).subscribe();
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * This returns a throwable
060   * @return
061   */
062  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
063    return throwable;
064  }
065
066}
